cards.title: 1 Warehouse
cards.description: For as long as your {guild_science} or {guild_barter} member is on the warehouse, whenever you visit a basic {food} or {sheep} tile, you gain +1 {any}.

tiers.description: During this season, whenever you gain {food} or {sheep}, you gain an additional {resource} of that type.

cards.title: 2 Tailor
cards.description: Gain 1 {wool}.

tiers.description: During this season, every second {stone} you collect is increased by +1.
During this season, every {stone} you collect is increased by +1.
During this season, every {stone} you collect is increased by +2.

cards.title: 3 Jeweler
cards.description: Pay 3 {gold} to gain 2 {gems}.

tiers.description: During this season, every {lumber} you collect is increased by +1.
During this season, every {lumber} you collect is increased by +2.
During this season, every {lumber} you collect is increased by +4.

cards.title: 4 Tavern
cards.description: Appoint another player. As long as your {guild_espionage} member is on the tavern, that player must leave at least 2 commoners on their nation.

tiers.description: Gain 1 {grapes} for every 2 citizens on the vineyard.
Gain 2 {grapes} for every 2 citizens on the vineyard.
Gain 2 {grapes} for every citizen on the vineyard.

cards.title: 5 Docks
cards.description: Look at another player's hand.

tiers.description: Gain 1 {food} per commoner on the wool farm. The wool farm can only be used in the spring.
Gain 3 {food} per commoner on the wool farm. The wool farm can only be used in the spring.
Gain 5 {food} per commoner on the wool farm. The wool farm can only be used in the spring.

cards.title: 6 Armory
cards.description: For as long as you {guild_battle} member is on the armory, the strength of all your commoners is increased by 1.

tiers.description: Gain 1 {cloth}.
Gain 2 {cloth}.
Gain 3 {cloth}.

cards.title: 7 Barracks
cards.description: For as long as your {guild_battle} member is on the barracks, its tier is considered to be +1.

tiers.description: Constructing a structure costs 1 {lumber} less to build this season.
Constructing a structure costs 2 {lumber} and 1 {stone} less to build this season.
Constructing a structure costs 4 {lumber}, 2 {stone} and 2 {construction} less to build this season.

cards.title: 8 Church
cards.description: Return all your citizens from a single province to your nation.

tiers.description: Turn 1 commoner of another player into a drunk. They cannot move this season.
Turn 1 commoner of another player into a drunk. They cannot move this season and the owner pays 3 {gold}.
for every 2 commoners in the inn, turn a commoner of another player into a drunk. They cannot move this season and the owner pays 5 {gold} per commoner.

cards.title: 9 Cemetery
cards.description: Reactivate a tile that holds one or more of your citizens.

tiers.description: Pay 5 {gold} to gain 1 {gems}.
Pay 3 {gold} to gain 1 {gems}.
Pay 5 {gold} to gain 3 {gems}.

cards.title: 10 Barbican
cards.description: Destroy a commoner on a tile that is in the same province of the barbican.

tiers.description: Draw 1 {card}.
Draw 2 {card}.
Draw 2 {card}. At least one is a promotion card.

cards.title: 11 Workshop
cards.description: For as long as your {guild_science} member is on the workshop, {guild_science} and {construct} cards cost 2 {any} less to play.

tiers.description: Place 5 citizens on the city hall. A province with no allegiance pledges allegiance to you.
Place 4 citizens on the city hall. Target province may renounce target player. Then, if it has no allegiance, it pledges allegiance to you.
Place 3 citizens on the city hall. Target province renounces all allegiances. Then, it pledges allegiance to you.

cards.title: 12 University
cards.description: Draw and reveal cards from the guild deck until you draw a {guild_science} card. Take it into your hand and shuffle the rest back into the deck.

tiers.description: Play a structure up to tier 2 for free. You do pay the construct cost.
Play a structure up to tier 3 for free. The first construct is filled.
Play a structure up to tier 3 for free. The first construct is filled. Draw a new {Science} card.

cards.title: 13 Statue
cards.description: Draw and reveal cards from the guild deck until you draw a {guild_celestial} card. Take it into your hand and shuffle the rest back into the deck.

tiers.description: When a player moves his/her commoners to target structure, destroy up to 2 commoners.
When a player moves his/her commoners to target structure, destroy up to 4 commoners.
When a player moves his/her commoners to target structure, destroy up to 4 commoners. Then draw a new {Science} card.

cards.title: 14 City hall
cards.description: Place 3 citizens on the city hall. Target province renounces allegiance to all players and then pledges allegiance to you.

tiers.description: Target player's commoners cannot leave their town this season.
Destroy target {commoner} in a town. {commoner} can not leave their town and cannot collect {food} at the end of the year.
Destroy target {commoner} in a town. {commoner} can not leave their town and do not collect {gold} or {food} at the end of the year. Draw 1 {Battle} card.

cards.title: 15 Theater
cards.description: Gain 1 {gold} for every commoner on the theater. They return to your nation before the season ends.

tiers.description: A structure of target player cannot be used the coming two seasons.
A structure of target player cannot be used the coming two seasons. Steal a random card from them.
A structure of target player is permanently destroyed. See their hand. Steal a card from them.

cards.title: 16 Lay siege
cards.description: Citizens of target player cannot leave their nation this season. In higher tiers, they cannot perform the gain {food}, {gold} or turn {sheep} into {wool} actions at the end of the year.

tiers.description: Target player cannot use a province for the rest of the year. You may use it during this time.
Target player cannot use two target provinces for the rest of the year. You may use it during this time. They discard a card.
Target province denounces all player(s) and pledges allegiance to you. All players deounced this way discard a card.

cards.title: 17 Brutish fervor
cards.description: Destroy commoners of another player. In higher tiers, you can also destroy guild members of other players.

tiers.description: Sacrifice x commoners. Target player also sacrifices x commoners.
Sacrifice x commoners. Target player sacrifices x + 1 commoners.
Sacrifice x commoners. Target player sacrifices x + 1 commoners and a tier 2 royalty or lower.

cards.title: 18 Demolish
cards.description: Destroy a structure or invention. In higher tiers, you also gain the resources that structure/invention cost and destroy any citizens on the same tile.

tiers.description: Target player discards a card.
Steal 1 card from target player at random. Then he/she discards a card.
Look at target player's hand. Steal one and discard the other.

cards.title: 19 Occupy
cards.description: For the rest of the season, you may use target province as though it had allegiance to you. Other players may not use it. In higher tiers, players on that province must discard a card and destroy commoners.

tiers.description: Steal one {card} from target player at random.
Look at target player's hand. Steal 1 {card} and 5 {gold} from them.
Look at target player's hand. Steal 2 {card} and 10 {gold} from them.

cards.title: 20 Wage war
cards.description: Sacrifice X commoners and destroy Y commoners of one or more other players. In higher tiers, the number of players increases and you may also destroy guild members.

tiers.description: When a player moves citizens to the same tile as your Battle member, destroy one commoner before the move action resolves.
When a player moves citizens to the same tile as your Lioheart guild member, destroy three commoners before the move action resolves.
When a player moves citizens to the same tile as your Battle guild member, destroy all citizens before the move action resolves.

cards.title: 21 Riot
cards.description: Choose between destroying commoners and inventions. In higher tiers, you gain additional choices.

tiers.description: Choose one province. Destroy one enemy commoner in all tiles of that province.
Choose one province. Destroy all enemy commoners in all tiles of that province.
Choose one province. Destroy all enemy citizens in all tiles of that province.

cards.title: 22 Pillage
cards.description: When you gain {gold} this season, take them from another player instead of the general supply. In higher tiers, take {any} or {card} from other players.

tiers.description: When a player promotes a commoner to a count, immediately destroy it.
When a player promotes a count to a duchess, immediately destroy it.
When a player promotes a duchess to a king, immediately destroy it.

cards.title: 23 Rampage
cards.description: Appoint a province. Destroy commoners of other players in that province. In higher tiers, destroy more commoners or citizens in that province.

tiers.description: Look at target player's hand.
Look at target player's hand. Discard 1 {card}.
BLook at target player's hand. Steal 1 {card} and discard another.

cards.title: 24 Ambush
cards.description: Destroy commoners when they move to a tile you have citizens in. In higher tiers, destroy more commoners or guild members this way.

tiers.description: Target player's turn does not resolve.
Target player's turn does not resolve. Draw a {Espionage} card.
Target player's turn does not resolve. Look at their hand and steal a card. Draw a {Espionage} card.

cards.title: 25 Overthrow
cards.description: When another player promotes a commoner, immediately destroy it. In higher tiers, destroy higher guild members.

tiers.description: Take 1 commoner from target player. At the end of the year, either they pay you 3 {gold}, or you gain control of that commoner.
Take 2 commoners from target player. At the end of the year, either they pay you 6 {gold}, or you gain control of those commoners. Draw a {DarkBlueAbyss} card.
Take 1 tier 3 royalty or lower from target player. At the end of the year, either they pay you 10 {gold}, or you gain control of that royalty. Draw a {DarkBlueAbyss} card.

cards.title: 26 Raid
cards.description: Appoint a player. That player discards a {card}. In higher tiers, discard or steal cards.

tiers.description: When a player moves their commoners to the same tile as your Dark Abyss guild member, annul their move action.
When a player moves their commoners to the same tile as your Dark Abyss guild member, destroy all commoners committed to that tile.
When a player moves their citizens to the same tile as your Dark Abyss guild member, destroy all citizens committed to that tile. Look at their hand and steal a {card}.

cards.title: 27 Spy
cards.description: Look at another player's hand. In higher tiers, appoint cards to discard from that hand.

tiers.description: The next time you are targeted by a tier 1 card, annul that card.
The next time you are targeted by a tier 2 card, annul that card.
The next time you are targeted by a tier 3 card, annul that card.

cards.title: 28 Infiltrate
cards.description: Another player's move actions do not resolve. In higher tiers, their cards don't resolve and you may discard or steal cards.

tiers.description: The next time you cannot move to target tile because a player blocks you there, move to another open tile within 3 spaces (if available).
The next time you cannot move to target tile because a player blocks you there, separate the workers into two groups and move them to two open tiles within 5 spaces (if available).
The next time you cannot move to target tile because a player blocks you there, separate the workers into three groups and move them to three open tiles anywhere on the map (if available).

cards.title: 29 Abduct
cards.description: Another player's move actions don't resolve unless they pay you {gold}. In higher tiers, you take their citizens and they must pay you {gold}. Otherwise, you gain control of those citizens.

tiers.description: When target player drafts a new promote card, you get to see what it is.
When target player drafts a new promote card, you get to see what it is. Gain a copy of that card.
When target player drafts a new promote card, steal that card.

cards.title: 30 Secret meeting
cards.description: Look at another player's hand. In higher tiers, steal cards and look at more than 1 player's hand.

tiers.description: See target player’s hand.
See target player’s hand. Steal 1 {card}.
Choose up to two target players. See their hand. Steal up to two {card} divided among them.

cards.title: 31 Former glory
cards.description: Take a {card} from the guild discard pile. In higher tiers, take more {card} and play 1 for free.

tiers.description: Look through the discard pile and take 1 {card}.
Look through the discard pile and take 2 {card}.
Look through the discard pile and take 2 {card}. Play one for free.

cards.title: 32 Assassinate
cards.description: Destroy guild members of another player. In higher tiers, destroy more and higher guild members.

tiers.description: Destroy target tier 1 guild member or royalty
Destroy target tier 2 guild member or royalty.
Destroy 2 target tier 3 guild members or royalty divided among two target players.

cards.title: 33 True intent
cards.description: Your citizens may perform more than 1 move this turn. In higher tiers, you may draw cards and return those citizens to your nation at the end of the season.

tiers.description: Name one resource. Target player gives you 2 of that resource (or up to the amount they have).
Name one resource. Each player gives you 2 of that resource (or up to the amount they have).
Name one resources. Each player gives you 5 of that resource (or up to the amount they have).

cards.title: 34 Dark brotherhood
cards.description: When another player promotes a commoner, promote a commoner to a {guild_espionage} member. In higher tiers, prevent that promotion instead.

tiers.description: Give this card to target player. They choose a {card} and give it to you as well as 5 {gold}.
Give this card to target player. Then look at their hand and take a {card} from among them as well as 5 {gold}.
Give this card to target player. Then look at their hand and take two {card} from among them as well as 10 {gold}.

cards.title: 35 Perception
cards.description: Prevent a {card} from resolving. In higher tiers, steal that card.

tiers.description: Target player's turn does not resolve.
A structure becomes unavailable to other players and you may visit it with your {soldier}m even if it is outside your {influence}.

cards.title: 36 Double agent
cards.description: Look at another player's {promote} card. In higher tiers, gain a copy or steal it.

tiers.description: Pay target player 10 {gold} to take over a commoner. You may repeat this for up to five times (and choose additional targets).
Pay target player 8 {gold} to take over a commoner or 12 {gold} to take over a tier 1 tier 2 citizen. You may perform this action up to five times (and choose additional targets).

Pay target player 5 {gold} to take over a commoner, 8 {gold} to take over a tier 1 citizen or 12 {gold} to take over a tier 2 citizen. You may perform this action five times (and choose additional targets).

cards.title: 37 Monopoly
cards.description: Name a {any}. Another player pays you {any} of that type. In higher tiers, name more {any}, you affect more players and you may draw {guild_barter} cards.

tiers.description: Target player draws a card and pays you the tier 1 resources it would cost to play that card.
Target player draws a card and pays you the tier 2 resources it would cost to play that card.
Target player draws a card and pays you the tier 3 resources it would cost to play that card.

cards.title: 38 Trade
cards.description: Give this {card} to another player and take from them either {card} or {any}. In higher tiers, you can choose from more options.

tiers.description: Give target player 5 {gold}. Over the next 3 turns, they pay you back 3 {gold} each turn.
Give target player 10 {gold}. Over the next 3 turns, the pay you back 6 {gold} each turn.
Give target player a card. Over the next 3 turns, they randomly give you 1 card each turn.

cards.title: 39 Taxes
cards.description: {card} that other players play cost more {gold} to play. This excess is given to you. In higher tiers, the extra {any} increases and the duration of the action lasts longer.

tiers.description: Gain 5 {gold} and draw a {card}.
Gain 10 {gold}, 5 {food} and draw a {card}.
Gain 15 {gold}, 5 {food}, 3 {grapes} and draw 2 {card}.

cards.title: 40 Bribery
cards.description: Pay another player to gain control over their commoners. This action can be played more than once and you may choose additional targets. In higher tiers, it becomes cheaper and you may bribe guild members.

tiers.description: The coming two seasons, your win all draws for tiles with other players.
The coming year, you win all draws for tiles with other players.
The coming year, a single commoner is enough to win tile superiority.

cards.title: 41 Time is money
cards.description: You may move commoners from one tile to another valid tile. In higher tiers, you may move from and to more tiles and draw a promote card.

tiers.description: The next 2 seasons, all {gold} income is doubled.
The next year, all {gold} income is doubled.
The coming year, all {gold}, {gems} and {grapes} income is doubled.

cards.title: 42 An offer you can't refuse
cards.description: Another player draws a {card} and pays you the resources it would cost to play it. In higher tiers, they pay you more and you draw a guild {card}.

tiers.description: The next 2 seasons, all {gold} income is doubled.
The next year, all {gold} income is doubled.
The coming year, all {gold}, {gems} and {grapes} income is doubled.

cards.title: 43 Loan
cards.description: Give another player {gold}. They must pay you back with interest. In higher tiers, there's a consequence if they can't pay.

tiers.description: The next 2 seasons, all {gold} income is doubled.
The next year, all {gold} income is doubled.
The coming year, all {gold}, {gems} and {grapes} income is doubled.

cards.title: 44 Prosperity
cards.description: Gain {gold} and draw a {card}. In higher tiers, gain more {any}.

tiers.description: The next 2 seasons, all {gold} income is doubled.
The next year, all {gold} income is doubled.
The coming year, all {gold}, {gems} and {grapes} income is doubled.

cards.title: 45 First come, first serve
cards.description: Trigger a tile more than once. In higher tiers, this effect has more targets and lasts longer.

tiers.description: The next 2 seasons, all {gold} income is doubled.
The next year, all {gold} income is doubled.
The coming year, all {gold}, {gems} and {grapes} income is doubled.

cards.title: 46 Investment
cards.description: Gain extra {gold} income. In higher tiers, this effect lasts longer and you also gain additional {gems}.

tiers.description: The next 2 seasons, all {gold} income is doubled.
The next year, all {gold} income is doubled.
The coming year, all {gold}, {gems} and {grapes} income is doubled.

cards.title: 47 Real-estate investor
cards.description: Gain control of another player's structure or invention. In higher tiers, you gain control of additional structures/inventions and may draw a {construct} card.

tiers.description: The next 2 seasons, all {gold} income is doubled.
The next year, all {gold} income is doubled.
The coming year, all {gold}, {gems} and {grapes} income is doubled.

cards.title: 48 Feed the poor
cards.description:
Gain {any}.
You may grant another player who owns a {guild_celestial} member a bonus to reduce this card's cost.

tiers.description: Gain 5 {food}.
Gain 7 {food} and 2 {grapes}
Gain 10 {food}, 4 {grapes} and 3 {cloth}.

cards.title: 49 Indoctrinate
cards.description:
At the end of next season, gain control of commoners in a province. In higher tiers, gain control of guild members.
You may grant another player who owns a {guild_celestial} member a bonus to reduce this card's cost.

tiers.description: Name a province. After one year, gain control of 1 commoner in every tile of that province.
Name a province. After one year, gain control of all commoners in every tile of that province.
Name a province. After one year, gain control of all citizens in every tile of that province.

cards.title: 50 Go forth and multiply
cards.description:
Create a commoner. In higher tiers, gain more commoners and a monk.
You may grant another player who owns a {guild_celestial} member a bonus to reduce this card's cost.

tiers.description: Create one commoner.
Create one commoner for every two commoners under your control.
Create 1 tier 1 citizen for every two citizens under your control.

cards.title: 51 Resurrection
cards.description:
Return commoners that were destroyed this season to your nation. In higher tiers, return guild members.
You may grant another player who owns a {guild_celestial} member a bonus to reduce this card's cost.

tiers.description: When you lose one or more commoners, return up to 2 to your town at the start of the next season.
When any commoners are destroyed, return up to 3 to your town at the start of the next season.
When any commoners and/or citizens are destroyed, return up to 5 to your town at the start of the next season.

cards.title: 52 Divine intervention
cards.description:
Prevent commoners from being destroyed. In higher tiers, prevent citizens from being destroyed and promote citizens to {guild_celestial}.
You may grant another player who owns a {guild_celestial} member a bonus to reduce this card's cost.

tiers.description: After the next draft, create a copy of one random card you drafted.
After the next draft, pick one card you drafted and create a copy of it.
After the next draft, pick one card you drafted and create a copy of it. Also, take a copy of your promote card.

cards.title: 53 God's will
cards.description:
Create a copy of a {card} in hand. In higher tiers, you gain additional options to copy cards.
You may grant another player who owns a {guild_celestial} member a bonus to reduce this card's cost.

tiers.description: Sacrifice a commoner. Destroy 2 commoners of target player.
Sacrifice a commoner. Destroy 3 commoners of target player. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Sacrifice a commoner. Destroy 2 commoners and one tier 2 or lower citizen of target player. Draw an {Celestial} card.

cards.title: 54 Devotion
cards.description: Sacrifice a commoner to destroy another player's commoner. In higher tiers, destroy more commoners and guild members and draw a card.

tiers.description: For every commoner that is bounced during the next season, gain 3 {gold}
For every commoner that is bounced during the next 2 seasons, gain 4 {gold}.
For every commoner that is bounced during the next 2 seasons, gain an {Celestial} card.

cards.title: 55 Tolerance
cards.description: When any of your citizens would be returned from any basic tile, move them to another valid tile and gain its benefits. In higher tiers, move them to more valid tiles.

tiers.description: Target player pays you 6 {gold}.
Target player pays you 6 {gold}. Gain an {Celestial} card.
Two target players pay you 8 {gold} each. Gain two {Celestial} cards.

cards.title: 56 Sunday prayer
cards.description:
Return all commoners to your nation. in one province. In higher tiers, return more commoners.
You may grant another player who owns a {guild_celestial} member a bonus to reduce this card's cost.

tiers.description: Return up to 2 commoners to your town.
Return all commoners to your town. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Return all commoners to your town. Promote a commoner to monk.

cards.title: 57 Construct
cards.description: The next invention or structure costs {any} less. In higher tiers, those types of cards are free and you may play an invention for free.

tiers.description: Return up to 2 commoners to your town.
Return all commoners to your town. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Return all commoners to your town. Promote a commoner to monk.

cards.title: 58 Fort
cards.description: Create a strength 1 invention on a tile. Other players must commit strength 2 to destroy the invention and visit that tile. In higher tiers, create more and stronger such inventions.

tiers.description: Return up to 2 commoners to your town.
Return all commoners to your town. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Return all commoners to your town. Promote a commoner to monk.

cards.title: 59 Grindstone
cards.description: Create a strength 1 invention on a basic tile. Each season, gain the listed benefits. Other players can visit the tile but must commit strength 2 to destroy the grindstone. In higher tiers create more and stronger grindstones.

tiers.description: Return up to 2 commoners to your town.
Return all commoners to your town. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Return all commoners to your town. Promote a commoner to monk.

cards.title: 60 Wagon
cards.description: Create a strength 1 invention on target {food} or {gold} tile. Increase the tile production when you visit it. In higher tiers you have more {any} options and further increase the tile production.

tiers.description: Return up to 2 commoners to your town.
Return all commoners to your town. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Return all commoners to your town. Promote a commoner to monk.

cards.title: 61 Siege machine
cards.description: Create a strength 1 invention on target player's nation. They must commit strength 2. As long as it's active, their citizens cannot leave. In higher tiers create stronger inventions and players lose {any} each season.

tiers.description: Return up to 2 commoners to your town.
Return all commoners to your town. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Return all commoners to your town. Promote a commoner to monk.

cards.title: 62 Horseback
cards.description: Create a strength  1 invention on your nation and place commoners on it. They may move every season to an adjacent tile. In higher tiers, it becomes stronger and may move to unallegiamt provinces.

tiers.description: Return up to 2 commoners to your town.
Return all commoners to your town. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Return all commoners to your town. Promote a commoner to monk.

cards.title: 63 Booby-trap
cards.description: WHen a player moves visits a structure you control, destroy a commoner before the move action is resolved. In higher tiers destroy citizens and gain {gold} from that player.

tiers.description: Return up to 2 commoners to your town.
Return all commoners to your town. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Return all commoners to your town. Promote a commoner to monk.

cards.title: 64 Built to last
cards.description: Counter a card that targets a structure or invention unless its owner pays you {gold}. In higher tiers, play a new invention for free.

tiers.description: Return up to 2 commoners to your town.
Return all commoners to your town. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Return all commoners to your town. Promote a commoner to monk.

cards.title: 65 Age of enlightening
cards.description: Draw and reveal five cards. If there is one or more {guild_science} cards among them, keep 1. Otherwise play a tier 1 invention for free. In higher tiers play more inventions and draw more cards.

tiers.description: Return up to 2 commoners to your town.
Return all commoners to your town. Draw an {Celestial} card.
Return all commoners to your town. Promote a commoner to monk.
At least three provinces must have pledged allegiance to you.
At least seven provinces must have pledged allegiance to you.
At least twelve provinces must have pledged allegiance to you.
At least two provinces must have pledged their allegiance with you with whom you can trade different goods.
At least four provinces must have pledged their allegiance with you with whom you can trade different goods.
At least six provinces must have pledged their allegiance with you with whom you can trade different goods.
You must have at least 25 {gold} and 5 {cloth}.
You must have at least 35 {gold} and 7 {cloth}.
You must have at least 50 {gold}, 10 {cloth} and 5 {gems}.
You must have at least 15 {food} and 2 {grapes}.
You must have at least 25 {food} and 5 {grapes}.
You must have at least 35 {food}, 12 {grapes} and 5 {cloth}.
You must have at least 1 type of citizen.
You must have at least 3 types of citizen.
YOu must have at least 5 types of citizen.
You must have at least 7 commoners.
You must have at least 12 commoners.
You must have at least 18 commoners.
You must have at least 1 structure.
You must have at least 3 structures.
You must have at least 5 structures.
Flip a coin. If heads: promote your commoner.
Throw a 10-sided die. 8, 9 or 10: promote your citizen.
Throw a 20-sided die. 17, 18, 19 or 20: promote your citizen.
You must have at least 2 promote in hand.
You must have at least 4 promote cards in hand.
You must have at least 7 promote cards in hand.
You must have at least 3 {wood} and 2 {stone}.
You must have at least 6 {wood} and 5 {stone}
You must have at least 11 {wood} and 9 {stone}.
You must have at least 1 monk.
You must have at least 1 priestess and 1 monk.
YOu must have at least 1 zealot and 1 priestess.
You must have at least 1 soldier.
You must have at least 1 lieutenant and 1 soldier.
YOu must have at least 1 general and 1 lieutenant.
You must have at least 1 agent.
You must have at least 1 spy and 1 agent.
YOu must have at least 1 assassin and 1 spy.
You must have at least 1 shopkeeper.
You must have at least 1 salesman and 1 shopkeeper.
You must have at least 1 merchant and 1 salesman.
At least two provinces must have pledged their allegiance with you with whom you can trade different goods.
At least four provinces must have pledged their allegiance with you with whom you can trade different goods.
At least six provinces must have pledged their allegiance with you with whom you can trade different goods.

entities.name: barracks
entities.description: a barracks trains soldiers. Soldiers can fight other units and help you invade other towns.
